title: INTENSE CAVALRY BATTLE - Third Age Total War Gameplay
description:
Third Age Total War Gameplay  - Rohan marches to war with the help of Gondor.  They are taking on an alliance of Harad and Rhun!  This battle has a ton of cavalry and bloody action!  Enjoy the battle :D

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
